select c.id,c.create_time,c.update_time,c.name,c.old_name,m.name as major,a.name as academy from classes c left join major m on(c.major_id = m.id) left join academy a on (c.academy_id = a.id) where c.is_delete = 0
and c.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
and m.major like concat('%',#{major},'%')
and a.name like concat('%',#{academy},'%')
limit #{current},#{pageSize}
